name: inserting
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
insert
C1 to put something inside something else: Insert the key in/into the lock.
C1 to add writing to a text, form, etc.: I've filled in the form, but you still need to insert (= add) your bank details and date of birth.
